title: RARE VACANCY in this Luxury Affordable Downtown High-Rise !
posting_body: Located at the core of vibrant city living.
Entertainment destinations, including Toyota Center and Discovery Green, are just a quick walk away and dining options abound in the neighborhood.
Breathtaking views of the downtown skyline, a sparkling rooftop pool and a wealth of other amenities separate from other communities.
Choose from studio, 1- and 2-bedroom floor plans, all bright and airy with floor-to-ceiling windows, luxe granite countertops and private balconies.
Discover stylish accents at every turn and become accustomed to an enhanced lifestyle !
Located in the heart of downtown, placing residents just steps from vibrant city life.
Pull up a seat at one of the many renowned local eateries or spend a day shopping at charming boutiques just around the corner.
Enjoy easy access to I-69 and I-45 when commuting or take a short walk to the METRO rail located just one block away.
Discover a community grounded in history and complemented with modernity.
Now with furnished apartments, it's even easier to call home.
Contact me TODAY to arrange a tour of this stylish community.
Texas Apartment Experts... Let me help you get APPROVED EASY today for FREE.
